title: Petro Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: In November 2014, he became a People's Deputy of Ukraine with 64.04% of votes in constituency No.12. Poroshenko became a grandfather on the day of his presidential inauguration, 7 June 2014. His wife is actively involved in the activities of the Petro Poroshenko Charity Foundation.

title: Maryna Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: Maryna Anatoliyvna Poroshenko (Ukrainian: Марина Анатоліївна Порошенко, née Perevedentseva; born 1 February 1962) is a Ukrainian cardiologist who served as First Lady of Ukraine from 2014 to 2019, as wife of President Petro Poroshenko.

title: Who Is Petro Poroshenko Wife Maryna Poroshenko? Four Kids, Net Worth And Instagram
snippet: Petro Poroshenko Wife Maryna Poroshenko is the first lady of Ukraine who has been happily married to the former president for over thirty-seven years.

title: First Lady of Ukraine, wife of Poroshenko, who is she? - First Lady of Ukraine: Who is Maryna Poroshenko and what does she do - 112.international
snippet: But only voters can decide whether Poroshenko is going to become the president for the second time. And we will talk about the First Lady, wife of Petro Poroshenko, Maryna Poroshenko.
